alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 20 at 1:23PM CDT until September 20 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN COLUMBIA...NORTHEASTERN DANE...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON AND SOUTHWESTERN DODGE COUNTIES... At 123 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Columbus, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Columbus, Marshall, Waterloo, Juneau, Reeseville, Richwood, Clyman, Lowell, Danville, East Bristol and Hubbleton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
